content.rendered:
Olymp project on the island of Cyprus in the town of Lefke, Gaziveren district. The aim of the new
modern residential complex project is to increase the comfort and
quality of life for our clients, as well as increasing the value of the town and the region.
The town of Lefke, inhabited since time immemorial by various
civilizations since time immemorial, is not only a city included in the international
Cittaslow or “Slow City” movement, but also a place to hold
delightful and fun festivals of tropical fruits such as strawberries,
oranges and grapes, at different times of the year.
Lefke, where the Mediterranean Sea harmoniously embraces the island, offers you a
a variety of activities from relaxing family vacations to active vacations: the CMC Golf Club golf course is located on the island.
SMS Golf Club golf course, located 10 minutes drive from the complex, the museum of archaeology and nature Morphou.
Morphou Archaeology and Nature Museum 12 minutes away.
drive. An hour’s drive away is the town of Girne/Kyrenia, home to some of the most
most famous sights of Northern Cyprus, such as the Kyrenia
Fortress — founded in the 7th century by the Byzantines for defense against Arab pirates,
the harbor of Kyrenia, the Church of Archangel Michael — an Orthodox church
built in 1860, the Catacombs of Chrysokava, Bellapais Abbey is called
the most striking example of medieval Gothic architecture in Northern Cyprus.
and much — much more.

At the same time, Lefka, also known as the city of education, is home to
3 universities:
● European University of Lefke (European University of Lefke),
● Cyprus University of Health and Social Sciences,
University of Cyprus)
● Middle East Technical University.
The Olymp residential complex occupies an area of 8600 m2 and consists of 336 apartments in 4
blocks.
The apartment layouts are:

76 apartments 1+0

176 apartments 1+1

80 apartments 2+1

4 apartments 3+1

Infrastructure of the residential complex:
When designing social

Indoor swimming pool
Indoor children’s pool
● Bathhouse
Sauna
Steam room
Fitness center
Indoor cinema
Outdoor movie theater
Indoor playground for children
Outdoor children’s playground
● Play area for adults
● Multi-court
Pool Bar
● Café
Barbecue area
● Massage rooms
● Work area and library
● Administrative office
● Poolside relaxation areas
Technical Features:
Technical features that will enhance the quality of your life and ensure its
comfort.
Amenities of the residential complex:
● Elevators for each unit
● Generator
● Water tank
● Satellite system
● Wi-Fi
● Outdoor air conditioning units
● Electrical and plumbing repair rooms
Apartment specifications:
● Air conditioning system in each room
● Hot water supply system (flow water heater)
● Spotlights, emergency switch socket modules
Ceramic floor coverings
● Washable antibacterial wall paints
● Decorative stretch ceilings
● Premium materials for heat and noise insulation, double glazed windows with double glazed windows.
noise insulation, double-glazed windows.
● Kitchen, bathroom/toilet cabinets
First-class sanitary ware
● High-security glass enclosures
Wooden interior doors

Safety and Environment:
Details that will help you feel failsafe.
● Emergency assembly areas
● Emergency and fire escape ladders and fire doors System
video surveillance system
● Steel doors
Video intercom system
● Safety power cut-off system for each apartment
Child-proof switches and sockets
Protected territory and controlled access to the residential complex
Landscape design of the residential complex
● Internal balcony landscaping
● Electric vehicle charging station system
